entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Haldimand County
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:59 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this morning. Risk of freezing rain early this morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 this morning then becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late this afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow before morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow or ice pellets. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Ice pellets or freezing rain beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
